nodes.text: A love potion was an elixir or mixture that supposedly would cause a being develop romantic feelings for another.
The love potion was a mix created by Logray as part of his many potions and tricks. It was a variant of the Hate potion.

In 0 BBY, during the Galactic Civil War, a female merchant on the desert world of Tatooine was selling potions in the streets of Mos Eisley. She attempted to sell a love potion to Imperial tax collector, Feltipern Trevagg.
